title: Apply Node Taint
description: Apply a taint to the single cluster node with key ||environment||, value ||production||, and effect ||NoExecute||.

validations.command: kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}' | xargs kubectl describe node | grep -A1 Taints | grep environment=production:NoExecute
validations.description: Node should have the correct taint applied
